restored: Killing a target with this weapon removes all negative status effects.
technical: While your signature skill is active, your Skill Power is increased by 15%.
fury: Hitting weakpoints increases weapon damage by 15% for 15 seconds. Hitting skill proxies increase critical hit damage by 30% for 15 seconds
on the move: Kill a hostile while moving to reduce incoming damage by 30% for 10 seconds
police up: Kill a hostile with any skill for a 10% chance of auto-refilling all ammo types to capacity
specialized: Add 200% of Firearms and Stamina to Skill Power.
nimble: After completing a cover to cover move in combat, you heal 2% of your max health over 4 seconds for every 1m run
expert: This weapon deals 100% more damage when the target is below 30% health.
fire: Headshot increase stability by 30% for 15 seconds. Bodyshot increase headshot damage by 30% for 15 seconds.
shrapnel: Applying Bleed to any target triggers a 30% chance to apply the effect to all targets within 10m
inventive: Your Skill Power is increased by 15% while you are at full health.
boomstick: Double trigger fires off both barrels in short succession
vicious: Critical hit chance is increased by 10% while having more than two segments of health.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
steady: Killing a target with a headshot removes 100% sway from the weapon for 8 seconds.
MMR, Does not roll on GS 256+
harmful: Each hit has a 15% chance to apply the 'bleed' status effect.
robust: Increase armor while in cover by 10%.
elevated: Increase your damage by 10% when elevated more than 1.2 meters above your target
sturdy: Increase armor by 15% when staying more than 4 seconds in the same cover.
focused: When no skills are on cooldown, your weapon damage is increased by 10%
adept: Using a skill increases your critical hits chance by 7.5% for 15 seconds.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
astute: The first 3 bullets of your magazine have a 5% higher chance to do a critical Hit.
tactical advance: Complete a cover to cover move to increase weapon damage by 2% per meter covered for 5 seconds
determined: Killing a target reduces skill cooldowns by 7.5%.(including signature skill)
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
ambusher: Increase your damage by 10% against targets in cover
SMG, Only on Converted USC and UMP
combat medic: Use a medkit near allies to heal group members and proxies within 20m by 40%
carefree: SMG, Only on Thompson M1928 and Tommy Gun
vigorous: Grants Overheal to all healing skills.
wildfire: Applying Burn to any target triggers a 30% chance to apply the effect to all targets within 10m
one is none: Headshot a hostile to have a 50% chance of not consuming the bullet
repo reaper: Kill a hostile with the sidearm to receive 30 rounds for your primary weapon
triage: Heal an ally with a skill to reduce skill cooldowns by 15%
refreshed: All healing is improved by 30% when in the last segment of Health.
dominant: Every kill while your signature skill is active reduces the cooldown of your other skills by 10%.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
destructive: Armor destruction value is increased by 15% when using this weapon.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
balanced: Weapon acquires maximum accuracy faster when shouldered.
prepared: Damage is increased by 15% when more than 30 meters from the target.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
midas: Each bullet you hit with reduces your damage by 1% and your target's damage by 1% to a max of 20%. The effect is reduced by 5% per second
brutal: AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
battle buddy: Revive a downed agent to reduce incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds for both players
showstopper: Your accuracy with this weapon is increased the fewer shells you have left in the magazine.
enduring: While in your last segment, your health continuously regenerates to fill up the segment.
uncomplicated: Damage is increased by 15%, accuracy and stability mods reduce this bonus
strike back: Reach low health to reduce active skill cooldowns by 20%
competent: Weapon damage is increased by 10% for 15 seconds after using a skill.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
proficient: The first bullet shot when out of combat has a 50% bonus chance to result in a critical hit.
precision: Headshot a hostile to pulse them for 10 seconds
rehabilitated: Heals 2% every second during status effects.
ferocious: Damage against elite and named enemies is increased by 10%.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
unforgiving: Damage increases based on your missing health: 1 missing segment +10%; 2 missing segments +25%
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
commanding: Every kill performed while the signature skill is active extends its duration by 20%
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
coolheaded: Performing a headshot reduces all skill cooldowns by 5%. (including signature skill)
desperate times: Reach low health to increase blind fire accuracy by 20%
cover shooter: Every bullet fired at an enemy from cover increases weapon damage by 0.5% up to 50%. The bonus lasts for 10 seconds. Getting a kill with this weapon while in cover resets the duration. The bonus damage is cancelled by reloading, swapping weapons, or exiting combat
LMG, Only Available on Big Alejandro
fear tactics: Applying Shock to any target triggers a 30% chance to apply the effect to all targets within 10m
responsive: When closer than 10 meters from your target, your damage is increased by 10%
lights out: Destroying an enemy weak point resets skill cooldowns for you and your nearby groupmembers. Can happen once every 10 seconds
caduceus: Each Critical hit heals you and your group for 1% of your skillpower. Can only heal each player once every 0.2seconds
talented: Killing a target with this weapon increases your Skill Power by 15% for 20 seconds (doesn't stack, killing a new target refreshes the timer)
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
predatory: Killing a target regenerates 35% health over 20 seconds.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
demolition expert: Kill a hostile with an explosion to increase explosion damage by 20% for 15 seconds
history repeats: Each bullet embeds itself in the target and detonates 1 second later for 700% of your firearms total
skilled: Headshot kills with this weapon increase signature skill resources by 5%.
toxic: Headshots with this weapon have a 15% chance to apply the 'blind' status effect.
pakhan: Each kill mades the next reload have 20% extra bullets compared to it's base
self-preserved: Critical hits with this weapon heal the user for 3% of damage dealt.
provident: The last bullet in your magazine deals 60% bonus damage.
AR, LMG, MMR, Does not roll on GS 256+
card counter: One half of the magazine does 20% increased damage. The half which deals increased damage flips after 15 seconds or when the magazine is empty
death by proxy: Destroy a hostile's deployed skill to increase skill power by 20% for 30 seconds
intense: The first bullet of a magazine has a 25% chance to apply the On Fire status effect to the target
quickdraw: When drawn weapon damage is increased by 20% for 2 seconds. After that weapon damage is decreased by 20%
critical save: Use a medkit during low health to increase damage resistance by 40% for 10 seconds
adrenaline: Use a medkit when not at full health to receive an overheal
play rough: Damage taken is reduced by 20% while firing. The taken damage is applied when you stop firing
fierce: Critical hit chance is increased by 5% when using this weapon.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
forceful: Your armor is increased by 15% while your Signature Skill is active.
disciplined: Killing a target will make your next shot with the weapon be an automatic critical hit
steady hands: Enter any cover to reduce recoil by 25% for 10 seconds
rejuvenated: Consuming a medkit increases all resistances by 40% for 10 seconds.
trained: Critical hits increase signature skill resources by 0.10%
relentless: 5% of the damage dealt by skills is returned as healing.
hurried: Critical hits increase reload speed by 10% to a minimum of 1 seconds reload time
glutton: Killing a target increases your damage dealt with 10% until you stop firing. Multiple kills stack this bonus up to 5 times.
decisive: Headshots with the sidearm deal 35% more damage.
recovered: Damage taken while doing a cover to cover maneuver is regenerated over x seconds upon reaching your destination.
accurate: AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
rapid: Decrease cooldown of healing skills by 15%.
meticulous: Killing a target has a 25% chance to instantly refill the magazine.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
savage: Your Critical hit chance is increased by 7% against targets out of cover.
capable: Using a skill improves the handling of your weapon for 15 seconds. Reduces sway, recoil, and spread by 25%.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
deadly: Critical hit damage is increased by 15%.
AR, LMG, SMG, MMR, Shotgun, Pistol
cunning: After reloading, the next shot with this weapon has a 10% higher critical hit chance.
reckless: You deal 8% more damage and receive 10% more damage.
tech support: Kill a hostile while any skill is deployed to extend any active skills duration by 10%
chain reaction: Damage multiple hostiles with an explosion to apply 20% more damage from the blast
tenacious: Increase damage by 10% for 10 seconds when using a Medkit.
shock and awe: Suppress a hostile to increase movement speed by 25% for 10 seconds
stopping power: Suppress a hostile to increase headshot damage by 25% for 10 seconds
steadfast: While in cover, health regeneration kicks in twice as fast.
evasive action: During a cover to cover move incoming damage is reduced by 30%
centre mass: Shoots heavy slugs instead of buckshot
distracted: Your damage is increased by 10% against targets with status effects
MMR, Only on MDR Battle Rifle
resourceful: All healing is also applied to skill objects.
